name: Revo Part's Manufacture
description: A manufacturing website where users can buy car part's.
feature: Users can purchase products, cancel products and add feedback. This response will be featured on the home page.
Admins can view all users, add new products, update product stock, and even set up admin roles.
A digital payment system has been added so that users can easily make payments.

name: Gadget House
description: A management warehouse website where electronic gadgets are stocked.
feature: Authentication system has been added using email and password or Google sign in.
Users can update stock and delete products on this website.
Security patches have been added using JSON web tokens for validation.

name: Davis Photography
feature: Authentication system has been added using email and password or Google sign in.
Users can see beautiful pictures in the portfolio section.

name: Enfield Bullet Exploration
description: A presentation website where presenting Enfield Bullet bike.

name: Car Valley
description: Car's website where you can present your car's.
feature: Users can pick one car by lottery system
User can clear dashboard and start choosing car's again.

name: To Do App
description: A listing task website where you can add your daily activities.
feature: User can delete task after complete.
Authentication system has been added using email and password or Google sign in.
